Main.title: Software Developer
Main.content: Hello! I'm Olcay Han, a software developer with 2 years of experience. I improved myself in web development, aiming for user-friendly solutions. I stay updated with the latest tech trends and welcome networking opportunities. Let's connect and explore possibilities!

Contact.title: Get in touch me
Contact.subtitle: Feel free to reach out for new projects, collaborations, or just to say hello!
Contact.quickContactDesc: For urgent matters, you can reach me directly via Email.
Contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent! I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
